titles: Of the death of Christ, the price he paid, and the purchase he made. Or, the satisfaction, and merit of the death of Christ cleered, the universality of redemption thereby oppugned: and the doctrine concerning these things formerly delivered in a treatise against universal redemption vindicated from the exceptions, and objections of Mr Baxter. / By J. Owen, minister of the gospel.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
publisher: Printed by Peter Cole, at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhill, near the Royal Exchange,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Crucifixion --  Early works to 1800.
Death --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
